extension.summary: Plugin for access to Live TV on HDHomerun devices
extension.description:
A plugin that allows you to browse and watch all the live TV channels available on any HDHomerun devices found on your local network.
Currently only works on Linux! If you want to help to make it work on Windows/Mac conatct me at tako(AT)codejive.org
